If they did a thousand col's in 100 days that would be 10 col's everyday.How is it possible when each col takes about at least one hour or more then you must calculate for the time spent on the decent.That would be about 15 to 17 hours a day riding.Then time to recover for the next day and so for three and a half months.I don't know.
